relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends and classmates.
Hermione is a friend of Harry's.
Hermione is also friends with Ron.
Binns is the teacher of Harry's class.
Hermione owns the notes that Harry and Ron copy from.
If Hermione refuses to lend Harry her notes, he will fail his O.W.L.s.
